description: Detects the use of the Windows Update Client binary (wuauclt.exe) to proxy execute code.
name: Proxy Execution via Wuauclt
query: (((process.executable:*wuauclt* OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"wuauclt.exe") AND (process.command_line:*UpdateDeploymentProvider* AND process.command_line:*.dll* AND process.command_line:*RunHandlerComServer*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\ \/UpdateDeploymentProvider\ UpdateDeploymentProvider.dll\ * OR *\ wuaueng.dll\ *))))
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g)
OTR (Open Threat Research)
Florian Roth
